title: people playing tf bronze/silver

replies.body: The way TF is designed, you are not -really- meant to win your lane (I mean you CAN, but at high ELO most players don't, but they do win the game), you are meant to roam and win the other lanes for your team, then be a stun machine midgame with moderate burst.
so better played jungler than mid basically?
Same as vayne. Bronze or Silver vn are just joking.

It's all thanks to Redmercy, hyping up Twisted Fate, saying "OMG TF IS THE NUMBER 1 AP MID LANER RIGHT NOW, HIS SO OP!" I've played Twisted Fate for a while, I've played Twisted Fate 110 times in ranked and I have a 67% win rate, which isn't too bad I guess. Guess you could say I'm an okay Twisted Fate {{champion:4}}
just looked at your match history... damn son well done
